column2: Clinton blasts Patriot Coal bankruptcy plan Davie
column4: Oct 2 U.S. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton said Friday that a bankruptcy plan proposed by Patriot Coal Corp. is "outrageous and must be stopped" because it diverts money intended for coal miners' retirement benefits.
